title: (x) Architteture Luminose thin geometric sans - Neutraface {Dav}
content:
Hello all,

can anyone help me to determine this typeface? I have found many similiar ones but not this specific one with low bars and rather sexy 'S'. Any ideas?

Thanks  
Javier

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [whatsthisT.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327015018/http:/typophile.com/files/whatsthisT.gif) | 130.22 KB |
author: javi2307

comments.content:
Well, As its a 'Font ID' request, this should rather be in the ' [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327015018/http:/typophile.com/forum/29)' part of Typophile, than in 'General Discussions', but we had this before.. :)

_Edit-A-Bit.: This should be ' [Neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327015018/http:/www.houseindustries.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18&subpage=viewfonts)'.._

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20150327015018/http:/www.formlos.net/)
WOW thanks thats brilliant. Sorry I got the wrong board. Its my first post ever : / was a bit nervous about it all :)

_\> It's my first post ever : / was a bit nervous about it all :)_

Dontchaworry, Javier. We all had our share of first-post-nervousness once. Welcome to Typophile, I hope you enjoy your stay. I'll take care of your mislaced thread and move it to the Type ID Board. :^)
